description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref PP/2013/5390 dated 14/02/2014 for: demolition of Junior School single storey Ark building, two groups of portable buildings and the single storey Art and Design and Technology (ADT) building, and their replacement with two 3-storey buildings adjacent to Montpelier Avenue, to provide Junior School classroom accommodation including for the re-sited nursery and ADT and 6th form accommodation. The non-material amendments are to omit the external rain water downpipes (RWP) from the 6th Form and ADT building (except the RWP to the entrance canopy), to alter the font of the cut lettering signage to canopies on the 6th Form and ADT building and the ARK building and to alter the wording of the cut lettering signage to the canopy on the 6th Form and ADT building to read 'St Benedict's Sixth Form', instead of the previously approved "St Benedict's".
